mapper.select: select * from( select chat.*,row_number() over(order by chat_no desc) rn from chat) where rn between 1 and 10
mapper.insert: insert into chat(chat_no, chat_title, chat_text, chat_wtime, chat_img, chat_user_no) values(chat_seq.nextval,#{chat_title},#{chat_text},sysdate,#{chat_img},#{chat_user_no})
